project.description: Custom Apache NiFi extensions by CUI-OSS, providing JWT token authentication from multiple issuers with a comprehensive E2E testing framework using Playwright and Docker.
project.description_reasoning: From README.adoc overview and components sections

nifi-extensions.responsibility: Parent POM coordinating build configuration, dependency management, and plugin settings for all NiFi extension child modules.
nifi-extensions.responsibility_reasoning: packaging=pom with multiple child modules visible in derived data
nifi-extensions.purpose_reasoning: packaging=pom at project root, manages child modules
nifi-extensions.skills_by_profile_reasoning: Parent POM module, only build configuration management applies

e-2-e-playwright.responsibility: Comprehensive Playwright-based end-to-end testing framework with WCAG accessibility checks, Docker integration, and automated CI/CD workflows for testing NiFi processors in realistic environments.
e-2-e-playwright.responsibility_reasoning: From README.adoc and npm dependencies showing playwright, axe-playwright for accessibility
e-2-e-playwright.purpose_reasoning: packaging=pom, contains only test files, Playwright E2E tests
e-2-e-playwright.key_dependencies_reasoning: Playwright for E2E testing, axe-playwright for accessibility testing, jwt-decode for token validation in tests
e-2-e-playwright.skills_by_profile_reasoning: JavaScript E2E test module, Playwright tests map to integration-testing profile

integration-testing.responsibility: Docker-based integration testing infrastructure providing container configurations for NiFi and Keycloak to enable local and CI integration test execution.
integration-testing.responsibility_reasoning: From pom.xml description and module purpose as test infrastructure
integration-testing.purpose_reasoning: Module name and description indicate Docker-based test infrastructure
integration-testing.skills_by_profile_reasoning: Docker configuration module, minimal Java skills for infrastructure setup

nifi-cuioss-nar.responsibility: NiFi Archive (NAR) packaging module that bundles nifi-cuioss-processors and nifi-cuioss-ui into a deployable NiFi extension archive.
nifi-cuioss-nar.responsibility_reasoning: packaging=nar with dependencies on processors and ui modules
nifi-cuioss-nar.purpose_reasoning: packaging=nar, bundles other modules for NiFi deployment
nifi-cuioss-nar.key_dependencies_reasoning: NiFi services NAR for runtime API, bundles processors and UI modules
nifi-cuioss-nar.skills_by_profile_reasoning: NAR packaging module, minimal skills needed for build configuration

nifi-cuioss-processors.responsibility: Core NiFi processor implementations including MultiIssuerJWTTokenAuthenticator for validating JWT tokens from multiple identity providers using oauth-sheriff-core library.
nifi-cuioss-processors.responsibility_reasoning: From README.md and package structure showing auth processing packages
nifi-cuioss-processors.purpose_reasoning: packaging=jar, processor library consumed by nifi-cuioss-nar

de.cuioss.nifi.processors.auth.description: Core processor implementations including MultiIssuerJWTTokenAuthenticator for JWT validation from multiple identity providers

de.cuioss.nifi.processors.auth.config.description: Configuration handling for processor properties including issuer settings and validation parameters

de.cuioss.nifi.processors.auth.util.description: Utility classes for token parsing, YAML/JSON processing, and common authentication helpers

de.cuioss.nifi.processors.auth.i18n.description: Internationalization support with localized messages and log record identifiers

nifi-cuioss-processors.key_dependencies_reasoning: NiFi API defines processor contract, oauth-sheriff-core provides JWT validation, cui-java-tools for utilities, snakeyaml for YAML config parsing
nifi-cuioss-processors.skills_by_profile_reasoning: Java module without CDI annotations, removed java-cdi; standard JUnit testing without integration

nifi-cuioss-ui.responsibility: Web UI components providing configuration interfaces for NiFi processors, including JavaScript components with ESLint/Jest testing and Java servlets for backend services.
nifi-cuioss-ui.responsibility_reasoning: From package structure showing servlets, service, util packages, and npm dependencies for JS dev
nifi-cuioss-ui.purpose_reasoning: packaging=war, provides UI components to be packaged in NAR

de.cuioss.nifi.ui.servlets.description: HTTP servlets providing REST endpoints for UI component configuration and processor interaction

de.cuioss.nifi.ui.service.description: Service layer providing business logic for UI operations and processor configuration management

de.cuioss.nifi.ui.util.description: Utility classes for common UI operations, request/response handling, and data transformation

nifi-cuioss-ui.key_dependencies_reasoning: NiFi API for processor integration, Servlet API for HTTP handling, cui-http for HTTP client, oauth-sheriff for token operations, depends on processors module
nifi-cuioss-ui.skills_by_profile_reasoning: Hybrid module with Java servlets and JavaScript UI; both domains apply; no CDI
